languages.text: "Знатные семьи с твоего главного мира ищут любой повод, чтобы уничтожить друг друга, элантах. Но лидеры должны стремиться к единению народа".
"The noble families from your primary world are looking for any excuse to destroy each other, elantach. But leaders must strive for unity among their people."
languages.original_text: "Знатные семьи с твоего главного мира ищут любой повод, чтобы уничтожить друг друга, элантах. Но лидеры должны стремиться к единению народа".

traits.locale_text: "The noble families from your primary world are looking for any excuse to destroy each other, elantach. But leaders must strive for unity among their people."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The noble families from your primary world are looking for any excuse to destroy each other, elantach. But leaders must strive for unity among their people."

traits.locale_text: "The noble families from your primary world are looking for any excuse to destroy each other, elantach. But leaders must strive for unity among their people."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “外界人，你原始世界上的那些贵族家族正在全力寻找借口，自相残杀。然而身为领导人，他们的职责本该是努力将人民团结起来才对。”
languages.original_text: "The noble families from your primary world are looking for any excuse to destroy each other, elantach. But leaders must strive for unity among their people."

traits.locale_text: “外界人，你原始世界上的那些贵族家族正在全力寻找借口，自相残杀。然而身为领导人，他们的职责本该是努力将人民团结起来才对。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Les familles nobles de votre monde principal cherchent la moindre excuse pour se détruire les unes les autres, elantach. Les véritables leaders se doivent d'unir leurs gens. »
languages.original_text: "The noble families from your primary world are looking for any excuse to destroy each other, elantach. But leaders must strive for unity among their people."

traits.locale_text: « Les familles nobles de votre monde principal cherchent la moindre excuse pour se détruire les unes les autres, elantach. Les véritables leaders se doivent d'unir leurs gens. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Las familias nobles de tu mundo principal solo buscan excusas para destruirse entre ellas, elantach, pero los líderes deberían esforzarse por unir a su pueblo».
languages.original_text: "The noble families from your primary world are looking for any excuse to destroy each other, elantach. But leaders must strive for unity among their people."

traits.locale_text: «Las familias nobles de tu mundo principal solo buscan excusas para destruirse entre ellas, elantach, pero los líderes deberían esforzarse por unir a su pueblo».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「エランタ、あなた方の重要な星の貴族一族は、互いを滅ぼす口実を探している。しかし、指導者たる者、民衆の団結のために努力しなければならない」
languages.original_text: "The noble families from your primary world are looking for any excuse to destroy each other, elantach. But leaders must strive for unity among their people."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタ、あなた方の重要な星の貴族一族は、互いを滅ぼす口実を探している。しかし、指導者たる者、民衆の団結のために努力しなければならない」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Den Adelsfamilien von Eurer Primärwelt ist jede Ausrede recht, um einander zu vernichten, Elantach. Doch Anführer müssen nach Einheit unter ihren Leuten streben."
languages.original_text: "The noble families from your primary world are looking for any excuse to destroy each other, elantach. But leaders must strive for unity among their people."

traits.locale_text: "Den Adelsfamilien von Eurer Primärwelt ist jede Ausrede recht, um einander zu vernichten, Elantach. Doch Anführer müssen nach Einheit unter ihren Leuten streben."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "The noble families from your primary world are looking for any excuse to destroy each other, elantach. But leaders must strive for unity among their people."

languages.text: "Ana dünyandaki soylu aileler birbirinin kökünü kazımak için bahane arıyor elantach. Oysaki liderler, halkları arasında birlik ve beraberlik için çabalamalıdır."
languages.original_text: "The noble families from your primary world are looking for any excuse to destroy each other, elantach. But leaders must strive for unity among their people."

traits.locale_text: "Ana dünyanızdaki soylu aileler birbirini mahvetmek için bahane arıyor elantach. Oysaki liderler, halkları arasında birlik ve beraberlik için çabalamalıdır."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
